title: Bug 5873Open Type Dialog doesn't behave as expected for former VAJ users
description: When using the 'Open Type' dialog in VisualAge for Java, you can type a fewletters of the class name, and then use the UP/DOWN arrow keys to quickly selectthe desired type from the list.In Eclipse, you are required to hit the TAB keyor use the mouse to move the focus to the list of types.Since a large number of Eclipse users are likely current/former VAJ users (whowould likely consider this a bug), it would be nice if the Eclipse behaviorcould be changed to match VAJ.
OB: Bug 5873Open Type Dialog doesn't behave as expected for former VAJ users
